name: Path of Sacrifices
description:
You are Prof. Sheldon, a symbologist and historian. Help your King on a journey to retrieve the "Path of Sacrifices" and discover the hidden lair of the "Ancient Brotherhood".

Sadly i did not finish the whole story. I just had not enough time. But you will get about 10 minutes a really good intention what the story is about and how the Sacrifices will interfere with the gameplay. I had to use the light version of RPG Maker VX Ace, so i was quite limited - but not my creativity :smile:

Controls: Move - Arrow Keys, Interact - Enter
